text: V otlichii dnya i nochi drug ot druga po prodolzhitel'nosti, svetu i temnote i v ikh postoyannoy smene v opredelonnom poryadke, i v tom, chto Allakh nizvol s neba dozhd' i ozhivlyayet im zemlyu posle togo, kak ona byla bezzhiznennoy ot zasukhi, i v raznoobraznykh poryvakh vetra, to kholodnogo, to goryachego, to sil'nogo, to slabogo - veskiye dokazatel'stva sovershenstva i vsemogushchestva Allakha dlya lyudey, kotoryye razmyshlyayut i prikhodyat k iskrennemu ubezhdeniyu
